condition: Herbal page. Standard herbal-section layout with plant illustration and surrounding text.

layout.description: Herbal page with plant illustration and text wrapping around it. Seven lines of text, single text block.

key_readings: otrol (from EVA otol, L2) = treat-oil -- ot->otr operator + ol suffix
kostain (from EVA qokaiin, L2) = which-bone-substance -- qo->ko + k->st + aiin->ain
dain (from EVA daiin, L5/L7) = given/substance -- high-frequency confirmed morpheme
hohtri (from EVA chocthy, L4) = cook-cook-treat-adj -- matches f1r L8 validated compound
validation_status.spatial_correlation: Herbal page with plant illustration. Text likely describes plant preparation.

transcription_method: Direct paleographic reading from manuscript image using 7-layer constraint stack. EVA source: Takahashi (H=Hermes, primary).
